title: Leavebuster help
body: Me and my friend want to play sometimes except sometimes when we start to wait and we are like 16 mins in his wifi just disconnects. Is there anyway to not wait 16 + 20x mins? Just wondering

replies.body:
If your friend resolves their connection issue, they'll be able to work through their low-priority queue with little issue. I'd recommend having them create a discussion here on H&S so we can assist them.

Let me know if you have any questions.
